Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I've ever been”
Reviews.Author: Stefano S
Reviews.Content: I've ever been in many hotels in Asia, Africa, Europe and Americasand this is definitely the worst one I've ever seen. Avoid it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: jboano
Reviews.Content: Old and simple, but good service and excellent location. 3min walking to central park, 1min to train station. We really liked it!

Reviews.Title: “Not great- but not that bad!!”
Reviews.Author: katelmcc
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Washington last January for a week for my 21st birthday with my boyfriend. The best thing about the hotel is its location- its about a 5 min walk from Wall st. Its also pretty reasonably priced- which i think is the real reason we went there to be honest- my dad wanted to say that he'd paid for half of it, so he found the cheapest hotel he could!! We stayed on one of the top floors, so we got a pretty nice view. The room was pretty dodgy though- the bathroom was tiny with temperamental hot water and the room was right beside the elevator- so although we didn't actually spend much time in the room, it was still quite annoying to hear "ding"s when we were trying to get to sleep. It was really cold when we were there, it snowed for about the holiday- so the city looked pretty, but we could have done with some kind of heating in the room. I complained about this on the second day, as there was a heater in the room, but it was stone cold and we couldn't get it on. The receptionist told me she would sort it out- but i'm don't think anything was done about it. I probably wouldn't recommend this hotel, but it still wasn't the worse hotel i've ever been to. As ive already said, the hotel's location is ideal- i'd definitely recommend Fluffy's cafe which is a couple of doors down- really nice and pretty cheap!

Reviews.Title: “HELL ON EARTH”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our room was the size of a closet! A bunk bed and the door...that's it! No window but a hole cut out of the wall at the top so we could hear other people on our floor. The sheets were dirty, there was a rat in our room, and I would not for the life of me use the NASTY toilets and showers! They were so disgusting!!! We left early because we couldn't stand it!!! NEVER EVER STAY HERE! Spend a bit more for a place you can actually sleep well and clean yourself...a nice B&B in Brooklyn if Manhattan's too expensive. I'd rather pay extra for a nice place and a subway ride to the city than stay in what I think Hell might look like!

Reviews.Title: “Don't ever stay here. It is the worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My family stayed there for FOUR nights. The worst christmas vacation ever. It looked like prostitutes slept there. The rooms are VERY VERY small and you have to SHARE A BATHROOM with all the people in you floor. Rooms share a window too. My window looked at another room. There was no heat and I slept with my coat on. DON'T EVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL. I cannot believe how there could be a hotel like this in USA. It was horrible.

Reviews.Title: “if you believe the washington hostel looks like those pictures...”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: i've got some bridges in iowa to sell you.avoid this place at ALL costs. it is a terrible, festering sore that exploits the "sight-unseen" component of internet booking to the fullest.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for..literally”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 4 nights, staff was helpful, maids friendly...however you do get what you pay for as far running into numerous prostitutes on my way our of the hotel at night... unusualy small bathrooms... a window compariable to one of a jail cell.... Over all its just OKAY, nothing special

HotelInfo.Name: Washington Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 2289 3rd Avenue, New York City, NY 10028
